H0.text: An anchor hallmark on a valuable metal item denotes it was made in which city. London

H1.text: An anchor hallmark on a valuable metal item denotes it was made in which city. Sheffield

H2.text: An anchor hallmark on a valuable metal item denotes it was made in which city. Edinburgh

H3.text: An anchor hallmark on a valuable metal item denotes it was made in which city. B'Ham

A4.text: The hallmark of the Birmingham Assay Office is the Anchor, and that of the Sheffield Assay Office was the Crown.
